attributes.action: Shut all Uk borders and quarantine those who have arrived
attributes.additional_details: We need to get covid 19 under control and whilst ppl are flying in and out with no quarantine all other measures will not be enough
attributes.background: Stop all international travel to and from the UK whilst we are in a pandemic , quarantine those arriving now

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Close the borders until coronavirus is defeated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165

Implement Quarantine Hotels for all UK arrivals from overseas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570364
